quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, make an effort to travel south. And then, take a trip west. Then, attempt to go west. After that, make an effort to head south. Then, attempt to go to the south. After that, take a trip east. With that accomplished, venture north. With that over with, make an attempt to go to the east. With that accomplished, attempt to travel south. Then, retrieve the shadfly from the table. And once you've done that, you win!

infos.name: cellar
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cellar. You begin to take stock of what's here.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a table. The table is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the table you see [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] However, the table, like an empty table, has nothing on it.[end if] You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a rack. The rack is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_1] On the rack you see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a chamber. You can barely contain your excitement.



There is an unguarded exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in a spare room. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here.

 You scan the room for a shelf, and you find a shelf. The shelf is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the shelf you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unguarded exit to the west.

infos.name: cubicle
infos.desc:
You are in a cubicle. An ordinary one.

 You can see [if c_0 is locked]a locked[else if c_0 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] suitcase close by.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The suitcase contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] What a letdown! The suitcase is empty![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. There is an unguarded exit to the south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: kitchen
infos.desc:
You are in a kitchen. An usual one. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call 'looking.'



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in the cookery.

 You see a board. I guess it's true what they say, if you're looking for a board, go to TextWorld. The board is standard.[if there is something on the s_3] On the board you can see [a list of things on the s_3]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You've entered a studio. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a safe.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] The safe is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a canteen.

 You see a platter. The platter is normal.[if there is something on the s_4] On the platter you can see [a list of things on the s_4]. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a workshop. You begin looking for stuff.

 You rest your hand against a wall, but you miss the wall and fall onto a chest.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You make out a mantle. [if there is something on the s_5]On the mantle you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: kitchenette
infos.desc:
You arrive in a kitchenette. A normal one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not?



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You find yourself in an office. An usual one.

 You scan the room for a mantelpiece, and you find a mantelpiece. [if there is something on the s_6]On the mantelpiece you can make out [a list of things on the s_6]. Now that's what I call TextWorld![end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]The mantelpiece appears to be empty. You think about smashing the mantelpiece to bits, throwing the bits into a pit, etc, until you get bored.[end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: dish-pit
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a dish-pit. An ordinary kind of place.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You are in a sauna. An ordinary kind of place.

 You can see [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] drawer.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The drawer contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The drawer is empty, what a horrible day![end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: laundry place
infos.desc:
You're now in a laundry place. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.

 You can see a case.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The case contains [a list of things in the c_4].[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The case is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You arrive in a study. An ordinary one. You can barely contain your excitement.

 Oh, great. Here's a non-euclidean box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The non-euclidean box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The non-euclidean box is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You smell a wretched smell, and follow it to a stand. The stand is normal.[if there is something on the s_7] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] hatch leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: attic
infos.desc:
Well, here we are in an attic. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a vault. A standard one.

 You can make out a workbench. Now why would someone leave that there? [if there is something on the s_8]You see [a list of things on the s_8] on the workbench.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the workbench.[end if] Hey, want to see a counter? Look over there, a counter. The counter is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_9] On the counter you make out [a list of things on the s_9]. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Hm. Oh well[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
Look at that sign! What does it say? It says Welcome to the cookhouse? Well that's cool.



There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
You're now in a recreation zone. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You make out [if c_6 is locked]a locked[else if c_6 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] usual looking American style locker nearby.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The American style locker contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] The American style locker is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_10]You see [a list of things on the s_10] on the desk.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: austere office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. An austere one. You begin looking for stuff.



You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: hatch
infos.desc: it's a robust hatch [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: suitcase
infos.desc: The suitcase looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: safe
infos.desc: The safe looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: chest
infos.desc: The chest looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: drawer
infos.desc: The drawer looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: case
infos.desc: The case looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: non-euclidean box
infos.desc: The non-euclidean box looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: American style locker
infos.desc: The American style locker looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: peanut
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that standard thing.

infos.name: cookie
infos.desc: that's a standard cookie!

infos.name: key
infos.desc: The metal of the key is satin.

infos.name: American style keycard
infos.desc: The metal of the American style keycard is antiqued.

infos.name: bowl
infos.desc: The bowl is expensive looking.

infos.name: whisk
infos.desc: The whisk appears to be to fit in here

infos.name: table
infos.desc: The table is an unstable piece of trash.

infos.name: rack
infos.desc: The rack is durable.

infos.name: desk
infos.desc: The desk is solidly built.

infos.name: shelf
infos.desc: The shelf is wobbly.

infos.name: board
infos.desc: The board is undependable.

infos.name: platter
infos.desc: The platter is solid.

infos.name: mantle
infos.desc: The mantle is solidly built.

infos.name: mantelpiece
infos.desc: The mantelpiece is unstable.

infos.name: stand
infos.desc: The stand is undependable.

infos.name: workbench
infos.desc: The workbench is solidly built.

infos.name: counter
infos.desc: The counter is reliable.

infos.name: stick of butter
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that usual thing.

infos.name: cabbage
infos.desc: The cabbage looks tantalizing.

infos.name: cucumber
infos.desc: The cucumber looks heavenly.

infos.name: chocolate bar
infos.desc: The chocolate bar looks delicious.

infos.name: gooseberry
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that normal thing.

infos.name: broccoli
infos.desc: The broccoli looks tantalizing.

infos.name: latchkey
infos.desc: The latchkey is weighty.

infos.name: non-euclidean keycard
infos.desc: The non-euclidean keycard is heavy.

infos.name: pair of headphones
infos.desc: The pair of headphones is antiquated.

infos.name: desktop computer
infos.desc: The desktop computer is well-used.

infos.name: towel
infos.desc: The towel is dirty.

infos.name: shadfly
infos.desc: The shadfly seems out of place here

infos.name: spoon
infos.desc: The spoon is antiquated.

infos.name: printer
infos.desc: The printer looks to fit in here

infos.name: bug
infos.desc: The bug is brand new.

infos.name: nest of beetles
infos.desc: The nest of beetles would seem to be out of place here

objective: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, you could, like, try to go south. Then, go west. Once you get through with that, go to the west. With that over with, go south. After that, take a trip south. Then, go east. And then, head north. Then, go east. And then, make an attempt to go south. And then, pick up the shadfly from the table inside the cellar. Once that's all handled, you can stop!
